text.text:
1. Check that the contact in Everbridge has an address.

2. Check that the longitude and latitude values have been correctly generated.

3. Check that your radius includes the contact’s address – don’t forget that Map By Location doesn’t work by Region, but by miles radius from a specified point, ignoring RE:ACT specified regional boundaries.

4. Contact an administrator.
Here is a link to <https://re-act.org.uk/tech-support|submit a support ticket> :fist:
